name: Loch Ness Monster Simulator
description:
Role play a Loch Ness Monster :)

3D REAL SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive and protect yourself in the ocean!

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such as sharks, tropical fish, and stingrays! Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous ocean!

CREATE A LOCH NESS MONSTER PACK - Create, unlock, and raise a pack of fish to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies.

BE A REAL-LIFE LOCH NESS MONSTER - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this ocean by searching for food, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey!

GAIN A FISH PERSPECTIVE - Easy controls so you can live your life as a sea animal or fish! Zoom in and out to accomplish your fish missions! Hunt prey to gain energy and experience points!

This game features:
NEW CRAFT MISSIONS
3D REAL SIMULATOR
EPIC BATTLES
FISH PACKS
AWESOME HIGH-DEFINITION GRAPHICS
3D OCEAN TO DISCOVER AND EXPLORE

Role play a LOCH NESS MONSTER!

Like us on Doodle Club! Follow us on Chroma Club!

Music by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
